Class: sofa.helper.CategoryMap

Defined in:
sofa-couch-service/src/sofa.helper.categoryMap.js:3
Dependencies:
None
Package:
sofa-checkout-service
Package dependencies:
sofa-core, sofa-http-service, sofa-q-service

Installation

  1. Getting the source

    You can access this class by installing the sofa-checkout-service package. Installing this package is as easy as running one of the following commands:

    • Via npm:

      npm install sofa-checkout-service

    • Via Bower:

      bower install sofa-checkout-service

    • Via Git:

      git clone http://github.com/sofa/sofa-checkout-service

  2. Embedding the source

    After that, embed the distribution file in your HTML document.

    <script src="dist/sofa.CouchService.js"></script>

    Don't forget that each package defines its own package dependencies. Make sure to embed their files too if needed.

  3. Use it!

    After that, create an instance of this service by using the `new` operator:

    var categoryMap = new sofa.helper.CategoryMap();

Description

Category mapping service that sets up mappings between category urls and category objects.

Methods

  • addCategory(category)

    Defined in sofa-couch-service/src/sofa.helper.categoryMap.js:26

    Adds a new category to the map.

    Param Type Details

    A category object

    Defined in sofa-couch-service/src/sofa.helper.categoryMap.js:50
